data.comment: Label for filter to hide decks from the user's collection on the GUI.

data.value: Hide decks with incomplete replacement suggestions
data.comment: Label for filter to hide decks with missing cards that the user doesn't have good replacements for.

data.value: Hide decks I don't have cards to complete
data.comment: Label for filter to hide decks the user is missing cards from.

data.value: Hide decks I don't have wildcards to complete
data.comment: Label for filter to hide decks the user doesn't have enough wildcards to complete.

data.name: Label_HideWithMore
data.comment: Label for first part of filter that hides decks containing more than some number of a specific wildcard rarity.
